main event: A bright white light was observed moving in the sky over Detroit, Michigan in 1967.
interesting points: The object moved very slowly and seemed very bright.
The air was very still when the object was observed.
The object gradually turned towards the east as it moved westward, appearing to get lower in the sky.
The description is consistent with that of an aircraft approaching and departing.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
photographs: yes, the report includes a sketch
